verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
On the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> of the first<WH259> month<WH2320> shalt thou rear up<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.
And thou shalt put<WH7760> therein<WH8033> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, and thou shalt screen<WH5526> the ark<WH727> with the veil<WH6532>.

And thou shalt bring<WH935> in the table<WH7979>, and set in order<WH6186> the things that are upon it<WH6187>; and thou shalt bring<WH935> in the candlestick<WH4501>, and light<WH5927> the lamps thereof<WH5216>.

And thou shalt set<WH5414> the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> for incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>, and put<WH7760> the screen<WH4539> of the door<WH6607> to the tabernacle<WH4908>.
And thou shalt set<WH5414> the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930> before<WH6440> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH4908> of meeting<WH4150>.
And thou shalt set<WH5414> the laver<WH3595> between the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar<WH4196>, and shalt put<WH5414> water therein<WH4325>.
And thou shalt set up<WH7760> the court<WH2691> round about<WH5439>, and hang up<WH5414> the screen<WH4539> of the gate<WH8179> of the court<WH2691>.

And thou shalt take<WH3947> the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and anoint<WH4886> the tabernacle<WH4908>, and all that is therein<WH6942>, and shalt hallow it<WH3627>, and all the furniture thereof<WH6944>: and it shall be holy.

And thou shalt anoint<WH4886> the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930>, and all its vessels<WH3627>, and sanctify<WH6942> the altar<WH4196>: and the altar<WH4196> shall be most<WH6944> holy<WH6944>.
And thou shalt anoint<WH4886> the laver<WH3595> and its base<WH3653>, and sanctify it<WH6942>.
And thou shalt bring<WH7126> Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> unto the door<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and shalt wash<WH7364> them with water<WH4325>.

And thou shalt put<WH3847> upon Aaron<WH175> the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899>; and thou shalt anoint<WH4886> him<WH6942>, and sanctify him<WH3547>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
And thou shalt bring<WH7126> his sons<WH1121>, and put<WH3847> coats upon them<WH3801>;

and thou shalt anoint<WH4886> them<WH4886>, as thou didst anoint their father<WH1>, that they may minister unto me in the priest<WH3547>'s office: and their anointing<WH4888> shall be to them for an everlasting<WH5769> priesthood<WH3550> throughout their generations<WH1755>.
Thus did<WH6213> Moses<WH4872>: according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> him<WH6213>, so did he.
And it came to pass in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> in the second<WH8145> year<WH8141>, on the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, that the tabernacle<WH4908> was reared up<WH6965>.

And Moses<WH4872> reared up<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908>, and laid<WH5414> its sockets<WH134>, and set up<WH7760> the boards<WH7175> thereof<WH5414>, and put in the bars<WH1280> thereof<WH6965>, and reared up its pillars<WH5982>.
And he spread the tent<WH168> over<WH6566> the tabernacle<WH4908>, and put<WH7760> the covering<WH168> of the tent<WH4908> above<WH4605> upon it<WH3068>; as Jehovah commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And he took<WH3947> and put<WH5414> the testimony<WH5715> into the ark<WH727>, and set<WH7760> the staves<WH905> on the ark<WH727>, and put<WH5414> the mercy-seat<WH3727> above<WH4605> upon the ark<WH727>:

and he brought<WH935> the ark<WH727> into the tabernacle<WH4908>, and set up<WH7760> the veil<WH6532> of the screen<WH4539>, and screened<WH5526> the ark<WH727> of the testimony<WH5715>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he put<WH5414> the table<WH7979> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, upon the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> northward<WH6828>, without<WH2351> the veil<WH6532>.
And he set<WH6187> the bread<WH3899> in order<WH6186> upon it before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he put<WH7760> the candlestick<WH4501> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, over against<WH5227> the table<WH7979>, on the side<WH3409> of the tabernacle<WH4908> southward<WH5045>.
And he lighted<WH5927> the lamps<WH5216> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he put<WH7760> the golden<WH2091> altar<WH4196> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> before<WH6440> the veil<WH6532>:
and he burnt<WH6999> thereon incense<WH7004> of sweet<WH5561> spices<WH3068>; as Jehovah commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he put<WH7760> the screen<WH4539> of the door<WH6607> to the tabernacle<WH4908>.

And he set<WH7760> the altar<WH4196> of burnt-offering<WH5930> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the tent<WH4908> of meeting<WH4150>, and offered<WH5927> upon it the burnt-offering<WH5930> and the meal-offering<WH4503>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And he set<WH7760> the laver<WH3595> between the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> and the altar<WH4196>, and put<WH5414> water<WH4325> therein<WH7364>, wherewith to wash.
And Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> and his sons<WH1121> washed<WH7364> their hands<WH3027> and their feet thereat<WH7272>;
when they went<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and when they came near<WH7126> unto the altar<WH4196>, they washed<WH7364>; as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And he reared up<WH6965> the court<WH2691> round about<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> and the altar<WH4196>, and set up<WH5414> the screen<WH4539> of the gate<WH8179> of the court<WH2691>. So Moses<WH4872> finished<WH3615> the work<WH4399>.
Then the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and the glory<WH3519> of Jehovah<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle<WH4908>.

And Moses<WH4872> was not able<WH3201> to enter<WH935> into the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, because the cloud<WH6051> abode<WH7931> thereon<WH3519>, and the glory of Jehovah<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the tabernacle<WH4908>.
And when the cloud<WH6051> was taken up<WH5927> from<WH5921> over the tabernacle<WH4908>, the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went onward<WH5265>, throughout all their journeys<WH4550>:
but if the cloud<WH6051> was not taken up<WH5927>, then they journeyed<WH5265> not till the day<WH3117> that it was taken up<WH5927>.

For the cloud<WH6051> of Jehovah<WH3068> was upon the tabernacle<WH4908> by day<WH3119>, and there was fire<WH784> therein by night<WH3915>, in the sight<WH5869> of all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, throughout all their journeys<WH4550>.
